name: Hoki Found -Waterproof Pet Feeding Mats with High Lips - Multiple Size and Colors for Dogs, Cats & Others-G

other_info.Target Audience: Small Animals, Bird, Cat, Dog, Insect

about_this_item: Made from High-quality & Non-Toxic Silicone. 100% PVC & BPA-free.
Clean up easily by rinsing or under the sink, or simply wipe down the mat with a wet cloth. Dries up quickly and is dishwasher safe.
SIZE: 19“ x 12”. Extra High Raised Edge. A thicker brand than similar ones.
Extra High raised outer lip prevents food, water and treats from spilling onto your clean floors! Please refer to measurements for size.No more messy spills on floor again.
Anti-slip, Non skid, Waterproof, Durable, Flexible,Soft and easily taken anywhere for travel.

title: Verified Purchase
content: I have 4 of these. Two are medium sized and the other 2 are larger. The medium sized ones I use on the kitchen counter for various needs, and can use them anywhere I need them. The larger ones fit my fairly large birdcage. I one instead of paper. I simply roll it up to take it carefully out of the cage, rotate it with the clean 2nd one, empty this one in the trash can, and put it in the shower to wash and dry it. Cleaning the bird cage was never this easy before... It doesn't fit the birdcage perfectly, so I bought the size that fits the width, with the length too long. That way it covers the bottom of the cage completely, and it's okay if it runs up each side by a couple of inches; no biggy. These are great. I am glad I have all 4 of them.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2024

title: If your puppies/doggy kiddos are sloppy drinkers….

I had previously bought silicone mats from an Etsy maker, but they got gross very quickly. This mat, however, isn't showing water spots or anything like that. The only downside is that the color isn't as pictured. I ordered the Battleship color, which looked like an icy blue, but what I received is a light grey.

title: True to form
content: I am using this silicone tray as a nail care tray/desk protector. I cannot comment on how I think it functions as a pet food/water bowl tray. That said, I LOVE it for how I am using it! I wanted something to protect the surface of my desk when I wanted to do my nails. After looking at hard, cafeteria-style trays, I realized silicone would be much easier for storage/cleaning/etc. I found some mats without edges/ridges, but I really wanted a tray with a lip or edge to catch any spills. This silicone tray rolls up and lays flat very easily. It is closer to a silicone baking sheet in stiffness than what one might expect from silicone in this shape/size.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023

title: Verified Purchase
content: For my needs, this thin quality is perfect as I can roll the mat up and use a fabric hair tie to hold it closed (like an old-timey map or scroll!) I have no need to pick up the tray when it is full of objects/tools, and it would not be possible given its floppy (not flimsy) nature. However, once cleared of the larger objects, picking up the tray with dirty brushes and tools that need to be cleaned and any spilled polishes/powders/etc is very easy, like taking a placemat to the sink to dispose of the crumbs - easy peasy. After cleaning the tray I lay a little clean towel over it to air dry the cleaned implements and tools on. Then, it gets rolled up and stored away with all my other nail supplies - fits right into my polish tote bag.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2024

title: Works
content: got two of these, one for me one for a friend. They are silicon so don't expect a rigid tray, but they clean up well and keep the kitty kibbles from ending up everywhere. For my friend, who feeds their cats outside, this tray helps keeps the occasional ant invasion at bay.  You do have to remove all the cat food dishes etc to pick up, dump any crumbs and wash, but it seems to hold up well and doesn't stain (I give my cats pumpkin for their overall gut health and it can stain)  I bought one of the larger ones to go under the litter box and help contain the stray litter. Overall i recommend. I can see other uses, as some reviewers have used in their kitchen for a coffee tray mat and so forth. Versatile and nice colors too. I got the battleship grey for the litter box and a soft pale grey-green (i forget the color name) for the food trays. Note that some colors are pricier than the others - i got the lower priced neutral colors.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024

title: Verified Purchase

post_time: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2024
